document_data.name: Razack's Tears
document_data.mainbody: '''Razack's Tears''' was a long stream located in the western region of [[the Ride]] on the [[Moonsea North]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}

Geography.Geographical Features: The [[Verdigris Trail]] intersected the stream at a bridge crossing just north of [[Verdigris]].

document_data.Rumors & Legends: According to legend, [[Razack]] was a [[titan]] lord that used his great axe to cut a [[Clefts of Razack|scar]] into the [[Vaasa|face of Toril]] itself.{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|82}}
